explanation: [0-0] A little girl in a purple dress and headscarf stands outdoors, her eyes wide with surprise, one hand slightly raised. A box of chocolates lies on the ground next to her. In the background is a wooden fence, with grass and trees in the distance.

[0-3] The little girl excitedly bends down and picks up a piece of chocolate, opening her mouth wide to take a bite. Suddenly, a cartoon bee appears on the right side of the screen, flying towards the chocolate. The little girl stares at it with wide eyes.
